Add-Ons¶

We’ve also developed bindings to popular utility libraries that add functionality not provided by vanilla SFML2.

sfeMovie¶

This add-on provides a single sfemovie.Movie class, which can be used to play movies:

import sfemovie as sfe

movie = sfe.Movie.from_file('some_movie.ovg')
movie.play()

For complete examples and documentation, please visit the project page.
